title: Border, 1900–40
creditline: Gift of Mark Bitter, Robert Bitter, Ward Bitter, and Tami Bitter Cook
description: A pair of very stylized red roses, separated by foliage. Printed five across, in red and brown on tan paper.

tombstone.epitaph:
Border, 1900–40.
1900–40. Machine-printed. Gift of Mark Bitter, Robert Bitter, Ward Bitter, and Tami Bitter Cook. 1992-139-60.
